alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 5:02AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN DOOR COUNTY THROUGH 530 AM CDT... At 502 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newport State Park, or 30 miles northeast of Sturgeon Bay, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ephraim, Newport State Park, Sister Bay, Fish Creek, Peninsula State Park, Ellison Bay, and Rowleys Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
